public class ExampleEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
implements java.io.Serializable

This Event encapsulates information about events dealing with examples

See Also:

Method Detail

getAnswer

public IAnswer getAnswer()
Returns the IAnswer involved in the event

getBase

public int getBase()
Returns an int representing the Midi note that the IAnswer in this event should be built up from. In ExampleEvents where a IRangeManager has not explicitly set this value, it will default to -1
